MARKETSWIMMER FAIR VALUE ANALYSIS
==================================================

BASE CASE VALUATION:
Average Owner Earnings: $-3,416,500,000
Discount Rate: 6.50%
Growth Rate: 2.0%
Perpetuity Value: $-77,440,666,667
Equity Value: $-71,994,666,667
Fair Value per Share: $-377.73


SCENARIO ANALYSIS:
    Scenario Growth Rate Discount Rate  Equity Value  Fair Value per Share
Conservative        0.0%          6.0% -5.149567e+10           -270.176635
   Base Case        2.0%          4.5% -1.339472e+11           -702.766002
  Optimistic        4.0%          4.0% -1.722120e+11           -903.525708
 Pessimistic       -1.0%          7.0% -3.683319e+10           -193.248623

METHODOLOGY:
1. Calculate 10-year average of Owner Earnings
2. Apply growing perpetuity formula with discount rate
3. Add cash and investments
4. Subtract debt to get equity value
5. Calculate per-share fair value
